title: Pressure Essence
text: Pressure Essence is a derivative of Gravity and Water. It represents the crushing weight of the deep and the inevitability of force. Mages who wield it can increase the atmospheric pressure around an enemy, crushing them into the ground or causing their lungs to collapse. It is a slow, oppressive magic that wears down defenses.
